attributes.additional_details: SAFEGUARDING FOR CHILDREN.GRANDPARENTS SHOULD BE PART OF CHILDREN UPBRINGING AND ABLE TO COMMUNICATE WITH OUTSIDE AGENCIES,
attributes.background: GRANDCHILDREN CONFIDE IN GRANDPARENTS MORESO THAN PARENTS. OUTSIDE AGENCIES DO NOT TALK TO GRANDPARENTS. WHEN A RELATIONSHIP ENDS IT IS THE GRANDPARENTS/CHILDREN THAT ARE USED IN THE BREAK UP OF THE RELATIONSHIP.ALLOWING NO CONTACT. NABLE TO CONTACT

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600326

If you want the Government to do something different to the above petition you could start a new petition explaining clearly what additional legal rights you want grandparents to have.
